Package ch.epfl.cs107.play.game.areagame

Class AreaGame

java.lang.Object
ch.epfl.cs107.play.game.areagame.AreaGame
All Implemented Interfaces:
Game, PauseMenu.Pausable, Playable, Updatable, AutoCloseable
Direct Known Subclasses:
ICWars
public abstract class AreaGame extends Object implements Game, PauseMenu.Pausable
TODO

AreaGames are a concept of Game which is displayed in a (MxN) Grid which is called an Area An AreaGame has multiple Areas

    • begin

      public boolean begin (Window window, FileSystem fileSystem)
      Sets the window and fileSystem.

      Initialises areas and players as new ArrayList, and paused as false.

      Specified by:
      begin in interface Playable
      Parameters:
      window - The Window that the game is displayed in.
      fileSystem - The FileSystem that the game gets its visual resources from.
      Returns:
      true if the game successfully started.

    • update

      public void update (float deltaTime)
      Updates the game, called every frame.

      Either calls update on the menu or calls this function on currentArea.

      Specified by:
      update in interface Updatable
      Parameters:
      deltaTime - The elapsed time since the last call to this function, in seconds, non-negative.
